DOC.brief_summary: This study include woman undergo pelvic reconstructive surgery and/or anti-incontinence sling procedure . Patients randomized combination L-methionine , Hibiscus Sabdariffa Boswellia Leaf Extract tablet placebo twice day seven day surgery ( total 14 day ) . In randomized , double-blind study , investigator assess treatment clinically suspect culture-proven urinary tract infection within 3 week surgery ( primary outcome ) , risk factor treatment postoperative urinary tract infection ( secondary outcome ) two study group .
DOC.brief_title: L-methionine , Hibiscus Sabdariffa Boswellia Leaf Extract Prevent Postoperative Urinary Tract Infection .
